relics.name: Sprighted Tiara
relics.description: At the end of each turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: It sparkles with faint electricity around the tips.

relics.name: Bottled Moth
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose a cost 0 card. Start each combat with this card in your hand, then draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: The bottle doesn't actually have a cork to keep the moth in. It seems to just like you.

relics.name: Bottled Sin
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose a Curse. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
relics.flavorText: Hatred calls out from it's glass prison, beckoning you to remove the stopper.

relics.name: Faded Starmap
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have no Starlight, Channel 1 Starlight.
relics.flavorText: By the light of the stars, you will find your path.

relics.name: Paranoia's Box
relics.description: Replaces Pandora's Box. At the end of combat, choose 3 cards in your deck to permanently Transform.
relics.flavorText: The fumes seeping from within give you an immense feeling of dread.

relics.name: 58 Leaf Clover
relics.description: Elite enemies always give Rare card rewards.
relics.flavorText: This is hardly even a clover at this point.

relics.name: Corestone
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 Invincible until you play a card.
relics.flavorText: You can hear faint, ethereal sounds from within.

relics.name: Adventuring Paint
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn while following The Line. The Line knows the best path for you.
relics.flavorText: You know what? I think what we need right now is a bit of music to lighten the mood!

relics.name: Black Indigonium
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose 2 cards in your deck. Playing one also plays the other. Become Cursed - Prisma Disruption.
relics.flavorText: It is black as midnight, despite the prismatic nature of the environment it forms in.

relics.name: Midnight Brew
relics.description: Gain 1 Potion Slot. Obtain 1 Vial of Night.
relics.flavorText: The smell is indescribable. You're abhorred by it's presence.

potions.name: Vial of Night
potions.description: Gain 2 Strength. Gain 2 Dexterity. Lose 2 Max HP. Obtain 1 Vial of Night.

keywords.name: Acrimony
keywords.description: Enemies with Acrimony receive 10% additional damage for every card in your hand.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Pink
